Status epilepticus

Status epilepticus seizure activity for 30min, or intermittent seizures without return of consciousness for 30min. Mortality is 25%, mainly from brain damage and multi-organ failure. Seizure activity causes fourfold increase in CBF and CMRO2 , with consequent rise in ICP.

Causes: idiopathic, genetic, tumour, trauma, stroke, MS.

Treatable causes: ‘me-me-me’

m eningitis, e ncephalitis,

o Mg++ ↓

o Glucose ↓
